meta.content: Front Page; Corrections; Editors' Notes; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: At the Summer Olympics in Australia, Marion Jones is trying to do what no other woman has done: win five gold medals in track and field. But when the Games start on Friday, the spotlight will not fall solely on Jones. Australian athletes will be carrying the expectations of a sports-crazy populace, and little-known competitors will be catapulted into Olympic stardom. Today's special report looks at each Olympic sport. SECTION F
